DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Chemoprevention use certain drug substance keep cancer forming , grow , come back . The use lycopene , substance find tomato , may keep prostate cancer forming . PURPOSE : This randomized clinical trial study well lycopene work prevent prostate cancer healthy participant .
DOC.brief_title: Lycopene Preventing Prostate Cancer Healthy Participants
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : Primary - Determine whether lycopene supplementation affect percent free bound prostate-specific antigen ( PSA ) healthy participant . Secondary - Determine whether lycopene reduces oxidative stress participant , indicate lipid peroxidation assay . - Determine whether 21-day washout period sufficient return lycopene , PSA , lipid peroxidation product baseline . OUTLINE : This randomize , placebo-controlled study . Participants randomize 1 3 treatment arm . - Arm I : Participants receive oral tomato dietary supplement contain lycopene twice daily 3 week . - Arm II : Participants receive oral tomato dietary supplement contain lycopene high dose twice daily 3 week . - Arm III : Participants receive oral placebo twice daily 3 week . Urine blood sample collect day 0 , 21 , 42 . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 150 participant accrue study .
